participant_1.background:
I'm a writer who enjoys spending time with my dog.
I spend time with my grandson on Saturdays and read about pet training.
I broke my leg when I was a kid, but I'm all better now!
i like to write my own songs.
my cats name is leroy jenkins.

participant_2.background:
I spend my day engineering sustainable solutions for the environment while listening to the Rolling Stones.
i sometimes drive fast.
i think i need a vacation.
i sing many songs.
i do not know if i enjoy programming , or if its my only choice.

content.text: Hey, I'm doing okay. How about you?
I'm doing well! I'm a writer and I enjoy spending time with my dog.
That sounds nice! I spend my day engineering sustainable solutions for the environment.
Wow, that's really cool! Do you enjoy your job?
I do, but sometimes I feel like I need a vacation. I think I'm just a little burnt out.
I know what you mean. I'm always looking for ways to relax and de-stress.
Me too. I like to sing and drive fast.
That sounds fun! I like to write my own songs.
Really? That's great! I love music. What kind of songs do you write?
I write all kinds of songs, but I mostly write pop songs. I'm also trying to learn how to play the guitar.
That's awesome! I wish I could play the guitar. I play a little piano, but I'm not very good.
No worries! I'm still learning how to play the guitar too.
Well, I'm glad we're both music lovers.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who enjoys the same things you do.
